chessboard.moves

Class Castle

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessboard.moves.GenericMove
      • chessboard.moves.Castle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KingsideCastle, QueensideCastle

    public abstract class Castle
extends GenericMove
    Class representing a castle, which is a special move where a king moves two spaces and places a rook on its other side.

      • implementationExecute

        protected void implementationExecute()
        The non-generic component of a castle. Moves the rook to the opposite side of the king.
        Specified by:
        implementationExecute in class GenericMove

      • implementationRevert

        protected void implementationRevert()
